vocabulary.example: My arms fell asleep because I slept on them funny.
I'm so cranky before my morning coffee.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the enforcement of discipline or rules
vocabulary.example: Haley has to appear before a disciplinary board for breaking the school's code of conduct.

vocabulary.definition: a lawyer; someone who gives legal advice and represents others in legal matters
vocabulary.example: Mitchell acts as Haley's attorney during the disciplinary hearing.

vocabulary.definition: below the legal age for certain activities
vocabulary.example: Haley admits she was drinking underage at the party.

vocabulary.definition: a formal protest raised in court during a trial to challenge evidence or a procedure
vocabulary.example: Phil shouts 'objection' to stop Haley from admitting to lying on her application.
